brief_summary.textblock:
Healthy subjects will be trained to used correctly a positive expiratory pressure device.
      The aim of the study is to evaluate te reproductibility of the correct used of the device
      after training

clinical_study.brief_title: Evaluation of Correct PEP Use With the Time

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  No lung disease

          -  Older than 18 years

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  Psychological disorder

clinical_study.official_title: Evaluation of the Reproductibility of the Pressure Generated by a Positive Expiratory Pressure Device

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: Cliniques universitaires Saint-Luc- Université Catholique de Louvain

clinical_study.source: Cliniques universitaires Saint-Luc- Université Catholique de Louvain

lead_sponsor.agency: Cliniques universitaires Saint-Luc- Université Catholique de Louvain

clinical_study.study_design: Endpoint Classification: Efficacy Study, Intervention Model: Single Group Assignment, Masking: Open Label, Primary Purpose: Basic Science
